document.full_text: president asif ali zardari condemned the recent murders of two high-level officials of his government and vowed to fight militancy and extremism to the end.
document.title: pakistan's president vows, again, to fight extremism
lines_and_colors: president asif ali zardari condemned the recent murders of two high-level officials of his government and vowed to fight militancy and extremism to the end.
